methods.name: configureVariables

args.name: protocolFee
args.desc: Protocol fee in base 10000

args.name: lpFee
args.desc: Protocol LP fee in base 10000

args.name: negativeFee
args.desc: Protocol negative fee in base 10000

args.name: exitFee
args.desc: Protocol exit fee in base 10000

args.name: stopPriceTop
args.desc: Stop price top in base 10000

args.name: stopPriceLow
args.desc: Stop price low in base 10000

methods.desc: Stabilitas DAO can configure the base variables

methods.name: configureOracles

args.name: o1
args.desc: Oracle 1 feed - ECB data

args.name: o1w
args.desc: Weight of oracle 1 o1w+o2w+o3w==10000

args.name: o2
args.desc: Oracle 2 feed - Time weighted VWAP from AMM 1W

args.name: o2w
args.desc: Weight of oracle 1 o1w+o2w+o3w==10000

args.name: o3
args.desc: Oracle 3 feed - Time weighted VWAP from AMM 1H

args.name: o3w
args.desc: Weight of oracle 1 o1w+o2w+o3w==10000

methods.desc: Stabilitas DAO can configure the base variables

methods.name: mintStToken

args.name: depositToReserve
args.desc: The token deposit transaction of the stable token.

args.name: oracleECB
args.desc: Oracle providing prices from central bank

args.name: oracleAMM1W
args.desc: Oracle providing vwap prices timed weighted from AMM 1 week long

args.name: oracleAMM1H
args.desc: Oracle providing vwap prices timed weighted from AMM 1 hour long

args.name: depositAsset
args.desc: Reference to deposit asset

args.name: claimAsset
args.desc: Reference to asset to receive

args.name: depositAmount
args.desc: The amount deposited to the reserve of stable token (USDc)

args.name: minimumToReceive
args.desc: Safeguard to protect the minimum amount received by minting

methods.desc: Deposit stable asset (USDc) and mint national currency asset on algorand.

methods.name: burnStToken

args.name: depositToReserve
args.desc: The token deposit transaction of the stable token.

args.name: oracleECB
args.desc: Oracle providing prices from central bank

args.name: oracleAMM1W
args.desc: Oracle providing vwap prices timed weighted from AMM 1 week long

args.name: oracleAMM1H
args.desc: Oracle providing vwap prices timed weighted from AMM 1 hour long

args.name: stAsset
args.desc: Reference to deposit asset (stCHF)

args.name: claimAsset
args.desc: Reference to asset to receive (USDc)

args.name: depositStTokenAmount
args.desc: The amount deposited back to the st reserve

args.name: minimumToReceive
args.desc: Safeguard to protect the minimum amount received by minting

methods.desc: Deposit st token asset (stEUR) and pay the stable (USDc) to sender.

methods.name: transfer
methods.desc: Stabilitas DAO can transfer token from fees account
